notes: This floor plan is designed keeping in mind the family of four, tight budget considerations, and Vastu principles. The triplex apartment layout integrates servant quarters, a dedicated home office (serving as dressing room/home office), guest amenities on the ground floor, and flexible spaces for additional use on higher floors. Art Deco design elements are incorporated throughout to provide an elegant yet functional living environment.
